short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A multicultural radio that opens the horizon for mainers and the diaspora.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Community and Diaspora Radio (CDR) is s an online radio station acting as a communication platform, a tool which allows local institutions, public and private entities, the State of Maine to exchange with new Mainers in simple English and also their home language for better social integration.

The extension will give you the possibility to listen to the radio and access the latest information.

Built for Chrome â€“ Listen to Community and Diaspora Radio anywhere from your browser. Just click the icon on your web bar and the radio will begin playing.  Click again to stop.
